tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vulnerability_tracking (
    vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
    severity_level VARCHAR(50),
    affected_system VARCHAR(100),
    patched BOOLEAN,
    patch_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id UUID NOT NULL,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    severity VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    affected_systems INT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (vulnerability_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patches (
    patch_id UUID NOT NULL,
    patch_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    patch_date DATE NOT NULL,
    patch_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    patched_vulnerability_id UUID NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (patch_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patched_vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE patches (
    patch_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_id INT REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id),
    patch_description TEXT,
    patch_version VARCHAR(50),
    applied BOOLEAN,
    applied_at TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_tracking (
    tracking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_id INT REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id),
    patch_id INT REFERENCES patches(patch_id),
    tracking_status VARCHAR(50),
    last_updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ
)

CREATE TABLE patches (
    patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    patch_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    patch_id INT,
    patch_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patch_id) REFERENCES patches(patch_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    report_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    severity ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high'),
    affected_software_version VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE patches (
    patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    patch_date DATE,
    affected_vulnerability_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE software_versions (
    version_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    version_name VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patch_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_id INT,
    applied_date DATE,
    applied_by_user VARCHAR(50)
)
